talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I don't need any of this stuff, so feel free
to take whatever you want!
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Hm? <snd:SurpriseM_01><sp:5:0:0>Oh, I forgot about those!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>The stable association sent us those
frames a while back.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad_00>They just sorta got buried under all
the junk.
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Er, wait, uh— Huh?! All that junk
is...<sp:5:1:0>gone?
Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If you need a place to rest your head,
you should head back out of here and go
<clr:0000>west <clr:ffff>until you find <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
It's a long walk, but you can make it a
short ride if you rent some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff>
at the desert entrance.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I keep finding
stuff that brings back memories and
letting my mind wander.
This stable and I are old friends, though,
so I want to make sure I get it cleaned up
and looking nice.
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Sorry, but I need to focus on cleaning this
place up for now...
Photo_11: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Is there anything I can help you with?
Change_Photo_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>So, <sp:5:0:0>did you want to do something with
that <clr:0000>smiling Spectacle Rock picture<clr:ffff>?
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I sort of let the junk pile build and build
until it blocked the entrance, which was
a real problem.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>There's still some work to be done, but
thanks to you, I can get out of this place.

That said, given that I'm wearing the
uniform and this stable's still standing...
would you be my final customer?
Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I like the enthusiasm, but you don't seem
to have the pictures I'm looking for.
Change_Photo_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Ah, <sp:5:0:0>any thoughts about that <clr:0000>picture of
the giant sword<clr:ffff>?
talk0000: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh! Um... <sp:5:1:0>G-good job making it in here.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>I mean, it's impressive that you came all
this way, but the stable has closed its
doors for good.
Thanks to this <clr:0000>extreme weather<clr:ffff>, almost
no one rides through here. We get very
few visitors of any sort.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Making things worse, <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> gave
the order that everyone had to stay away
from our well.
But we need that water, not to mention
the <clr:0000>mushrooms<clr:ffff> that grow inside it...<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>"It's only temporary—it'll help," she said. "I'll
be right back to fix it," she said.<sp:5:0:0> And then she
completely abandoned us...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Y-you're saying Princess Zelda sealed the
well to keep monsters from coming out of
it? <sp:5:0:0>To save the stable?!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm ashamed of myself for even imagining
that she would abandon us. She really did
have our best interests at heart.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Come to think of it, we did have a surge in
monster sightings after building the well
that only ended once it was sealed off...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I was so busy cleaning out the stable,
I never even considered that they might
be connected.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thank you for looking into it for me.<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Next time I see Princess Zelda, I'll be sure
to thank her too!
Photo_01:
Property of the Stable Association.
Please do not touch.
　　                                   -Stable Owner
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's nice to have a guest again. <sp:5:0:0>Even if,
like I told you, this stable is officially no
longer in operation.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Thanks to this <clr:0000>extreme weather<clr:ffff>, almost
no one rides through here. We get very
few visitors of any sort.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Making things worse, <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>gave
the order that everyone had to stay away
from our well.
But we need that water, not to mention
the <clr:0000>mushrooms<clr:ffff> growing inside it...

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>"It's only temporary—it'll help," she said. "I'll
be right back to fix it," she said.<sp:5:0:0> And then she
completely abandoned us...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, Link,<sp:5:0:0> did that <clr:0000>picture frame<clr:ffff> pique
your curiosity?
talk0005: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>Whoa, huh? All that junk is just...<sp:5:1:0>gone?
Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks to you, I've put up pictures of
both smiling Spectacle Rock and the
Forgotten Sword.
Having to close the stable down had me
feeling blue, but these pictures have given
me courage and a smile.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If the day ever comes when I have to
leave this place, I'm tucking one under
each arm before I walk out the door!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>I wasn't sure what you were up to, truth
be told, but clearly it was all part of
masterfully removing that junk!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You saved me! Thank you!
Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Really?! You brought me both of the
pictures I wanted?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>So, which one do I get to see first? <sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>The grin on Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>that
massive sword<clr:ffff>?
Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You're back! You're really back! Oh, it's
good to see another face around here.
Thank you so much!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Now, how can I help?
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Anything else? <sp:5:0:0>If you want to stay the
night somewhere, I recommend you try
your luck at <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll find it if you head out of here, look
<clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, and just keep going and going.

It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>As for me, I've got a mountain of junk to
clear out of here, so I should get back to
it. <sp:5:0:0>Otherwise, I'll never be able to leave...
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Let's just hope I can figure out something to <clr:0000>do<clr:ffff>
with it all...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Like I said, this stable's done for.


<sp:3:0:2:0301>With this <clr:0000>wild weather<clr:ffff>, we're not getting
any visitors here whatsoever. I've got
no choice but to close things down.
Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So if you need a place to stay, I suggest
you head out that door and go <clr:0000>west <clr:ffff>until
you find <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
It's a long walk, but if you can rent some
<clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's entrance,
you'll get there in no time flat.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I keep finding
stuff that brings back memories and
letting my mind wander.
This stable and I are old friends, though,
so I want to make sure I get it cleaned up
and looking nice.
Com_Photo_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>So this is the giant sword, huh? It's so
much bigger than I ever imagined!

<snd:LaughS_00>I knew it was out there, but finally getting
my eyes on it... Wow, just wow!
Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>On top of everything else, <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>
gave the order that everyone had to stay
away from our well.
But we need that water, not to mention
the <clr:0000>mushrooms <clr:ffff>growing inside of it.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>"It's only temporary—it'll help," she said. "I'll
be right back to fix it," she said.<sp:5:0:0> And then she
completely abandoned us...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Whoops, <sp:5:0:0>there I go, letting my despair
crush me again. <sp:5:1:0>Anyway, if you need a
place to stay...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I recommend you walk out that door,
turn <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, and keep going until you find
yourself at <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
It's a long haul, but if you can rent some
<clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's entrance,
you'll get there in no time flat.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I keep finding
stuff that brings back memories and
letting my mind wander.
This stable and I are old friends, though,
so I want to make sure I get it cleaned up
and looking nice.
Com_Photo_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>There are all sorts of rumors about that
sword. Nobody knows who made it, when
it came from, or how it was used.
Some even think that it was wielded in
battle. But who could be big enough to
swing something like that around?
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Maybe when I close this stable for good, I should
take a trip to see the sword in person...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh, sorry, <sp:5:0:0>got lost in thought there.
Com_Photo_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Wow! With two great pictures, <sp:5:0:0>this stable
is practically a museum!
Com_Photo_24: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>If only I had beds for any visitors...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I gotta say,<sp:5:0:0> looking at that picture always
puts a grin on my face.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_00>It turns out the Stable Association sent
me two frames by mistake.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Kind of ironic, given we're about to close.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>But far be it from me to look a gift horse
in the mouth. I might as well use the other
frame to bid the stable farewell in style.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I think a picture of the <clr:0000>giant sword <clr:ffff>stuck
into <clr:0000>a peak in the Gerudo Highlands <clr:ffff>is
the neat goodbye this stable deserves.<clr:0000>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think><clr:ffff>It's just northwest of here, <sp:5:0:0>but I won't be
able to go see it. I have cleaning to do.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Besides, it's COLD in the Gerudo Highlands...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><sp:0:2:2:6400>Even a copied picture of the <clr:0000>giant sword<clr:ffff>
would liven up this old place.
Com_Photo_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>What's that?<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of the
giant sword<clr:ffff>?!
Com_Photo_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>I'd like to give this stable an appropriately
cool farewell by putting something really
exciting in that frame.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And just northwest of here, there's a <clr:0000>giant
sword<clr:ffff> sticking out of <clr:0000>a mountain peak in
the Gerudo Highlands<clr:ffff>! It'd be perfect!<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Unfortunately, <sp:5:0:0>there's no way I'll ever be
able to go see it. I need to clean the
stable, and it's COLD in those highlands.
Com_Photo_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Chat_00>I wish I had a picture of that <clr:0000>huge sword<clr:ffff>
stuck into the peak of <clr:0000>the mountain in
the Gerudo Highlands<clr:ffff>.
This stable deserves to have something
neat on its wall to see it off, y'know?
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>I was so focused on cleaning up, I
completely forgot about these frames
the Stable Association sent me!
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I owe this stable a lot. After all the good
years it's given me, I'd like to put up
something nice so it can go out in style.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Y'know, I heard an interesting story from
a Rito traveler who stopped by here once.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_01>There's this local attraction nearby—
<sp:5:0:0>Spectacle Rock.<sp:5:0:0> Just check your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>.
The place is famous!
And this traveler told me that while they
were flying <clr:0000>over Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>, they
glanced down and saw it <clr:0000>smiling<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's what I want to frame. <sp:5:0:0>What could
be better than sending the stable off with
a smile?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>It's just a shame that I can't fly to capture
that view for myself.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>But if I had even a picture of the <clr:0000>smiling
Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>, I could copy it for the
frame and cheer things up in here!
Com_Photo_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me a <clr:0000>drawing of the
giant sword<clr:ffff>?
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>They're even nicer than I thought!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Maybe a little art on the walls would be
nice, just so the stable's final days don't
have to be so lonely...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>What's that?<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of the
smiling Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>?!
Com_Photo_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>If only I had a <clr:0000>picture of the giant sword<clr:ffff>
to look at, I could just copy it!
talk0051:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Sorry, sorry. There I go, getting all blue
again. <sp:5:0:0>Anyway, if you're looking for a
place to rest your head...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I recommend <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>. Just head
out of here, point yourself <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, then
keep going until you stumble onto it.<sp:0:2:2:5000>
<sp:0:2:2:6400>It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.<sp:0:2:2:5000>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00><sp:0:2:2:6400>As for me, I've got a mountain of junk to
clear out of here, so I should get back to
it. Otherwise, I'll never be able to leave!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Not that I know what to <clr:0000>do<clr:ffff> with it all...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Wakeup_01>I'd like to send this stable off with a smile,<sp:5:0:0>
and the best way to do that is to put up a
picture of <clr:0000>Spectacle Rock smiling<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:0000>Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff> is a local attraction. <sp:5:0:0>You'll
find it on your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>! <sp:5:0:0>And when seen from
<clr:0000>above<clr:ffff>, it apparently looks like it's smiling.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish I could fly like a Rito.<sp:5:0:0> Then I could
capture the sight on canvas and bring a
little happiness to these walls.
Com_Photo_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>This is a great picture, but if you happen
to have <clr:0000>one of the giant sword<clr:ffff>, I'd love to
see it!
talk0052:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0301><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh, sorry about that. The sadness just<sp:5:0:0>
gets to me sometimes...<sp:5:1:0> Anyway, if you're
looking for a place to rest...
I recommend <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>! Just head
out of here, turn <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, keep going for a
whiiile, and there you'll find it.<sp:0:2:2:5000>
<sp:0:2:2:6400>It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in no time.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wait, really?!<sp:5:0:0> Did you seriously bring me
a <clr:0000>picture of the smiling Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>?!
Com_Photo_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Sad_00>So it's called "the Forgotten Sword"?
Even abandoned in a harsh land, it still
cuts an imposing figure...<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And so do I! There's fight in me yet!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>If you've got <clr:0000>pictures of the giant sword<clr:ffff>,
show 'em to me, and I'll copy and display
whichever you want!
Just let me know if you want to swap out!
talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>As for me, I've got a mountain of junk to
clear out, so I'll get back to it. <sp:5:0:0>Can't leave
a mess when I close things down.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But just how am I going to <clr:0000>deal<clr:ffff> with all this stuff?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I'd even be fine seeing someone else's
painting of <clr:0000>the smiling Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>.
That way, I could at least copy it!
Com_Photo_Thank_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Now that I've got this awesome <clr:0000>picture of
the giant sword<clr:ffff> on the wall, the stable
itself feels happier!
Thank you, truly!
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you happen to have a picture of <clr:0000>the
smiling Spectacle Rock<clr:ffff>, I'd be really glad
if you showed it to me!
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Unconscious_00>Um, sir...<sp:5:1:0> That is quite the outfit you have
on. <sp:5:1:0>Or...don't have on, as it were.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_00>Yes...<sp:5:0:0> Yes, I knew this sight would be just
the thing to cheer me up! <sp:5:0:0>Reminds me of
when this place was full of smiles.
Still, if you ever have a different picture
of <clr:0000>Spectacle Rock smiling<clr:ffff>, I'd be happy to
copy it down and put it up instead.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Just let me know when you want to see
something else in this lovely frame!
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>You brought a smile to my stable wall and
to my face as well!

Now I feel like I can finally finish cleaning
this place up. Thank you!
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You came back! <sp:5:0:0>Thank you! <sp:5:0:0>I mean, the
stable still isn't in operation, but it's nice
to see a friendly face.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0301><clr:ffff>Thanks to this <clr:0000>extreme weather<clr:ffff>, almost
no one rides through here. We get very
few visitors of any sort.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Making things worse, <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> gave
the order that everyone had to stay away
from our well.
But we need that water, not to mention
the <clr:0000>mushrooms<clr:ffff> growing inside it.

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>"It's only temporary—it'll help," she said. "I'll
be right back to fix it," she said.<sp:5:0:0> And then she
completely abandoned us...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Sorry, sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I just get...sad sometimes
lately. <sp:5:1:0>Anyway, if you're looking for a
place to rest your head...
I'd give <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar <clr:ffff>a try. If you
head out of here, turn <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, and keep
going and going, you'll find it in time.
It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I found some
stuff that brought back memories, and my
progress ground to a nostalgic halt.
I mean, this stable's like an old friend of
mine. If I clean it up, I want to clean it up
right. Give it the proper respect, y'know?
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>It really does look like it's smiling!<sp:5:0:0>
Hee-hee...<sp:5:0:0> Every time I look at it,
I smile too!
<snd:LaughS_01>Things got a little lonely around here once
the stable closed, but having this here
makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside.
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>That Rito traveler said they saw <clr:0000>Spectacle
Rock<clr:ffff> wearing a big <clr:0000>smile<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'd love to hang that grin up on my wall
and bring a little light to this place.
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_01>Fancy seeing you up and about. Not the
type to set with the sun, are you?
talk0045: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_01>Bit of a night owl, aren't you?
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>OK! Welcome to Gerudo Canyon Stable!
You, sir, have the honor of being the very
last guest this stable will ever have!
And that, dear customer, deserves
commemoration...
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You're...not actually a stable
association member?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Yeah, I can see how the Pony Point thing
could be confusing. It was going to be
your reward for helping me clean...
<sp:3:0:2:0001>But you can't earn Pony Points until
you've registered at another stable. <sp:5:0:0>Come
back and get your point once you do!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Whoa, what? Is the massive pile of junk
getting less...<sp:5:1:0>massive?
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Hey, it looks like you're now officially a
member! Allow me to offer you thanks for
helping me finally clean this stable, then.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Well, that appears to be the end of my
time as a stablehand.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's been a pleasure, sir, and I sincerely
hope your journey ahead is a fruitful one!

Now then,<sp:5:1:0> I still have a little more junk
to clear away, so I better get back to it.
Thank you again for all your help!
talk0048: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Work_01>Let me just take off that wrapping...
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Thank you for helping with the cleaning!<sp:0:4:0>We're closed, so obviously we can't
offer you lodging, but you're welcome
to shelter from the weather in here.
Yep...<sp:5:1:0>just stand around passing the time
until the weather clears...<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Come on, Piaffe... <sp:5:1:0>You could've left at least one
bed out. Oh, well...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You came back! Thank you! I mean, the
stable still isn't in operation, but it's nice
to see a friendly face.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Thanks to this <clr:0000>extreme weather<clr:ffff>, almost
no one rides through here. We get very
few visitors of any sort.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So if you're looking for a place to stay
the night...

I'd give <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar <clr:ffff>a try. If you
head out of here, turn <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, and keep
going and going, you'll find it in time.
It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I found some
stuff that brought back memories, and my
progress has come to a nostalgic halt.
I mean, this stable's like an old friend of
mine. If I clean it up, I want to clean it up
right. Give it the proper respect, y'know?
near0000: Will I ever clean all this up?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's nice to have a guest again.<sp:5:0:0> Even if,
like I told you, this stable is officially no
longer in operation.
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad><clr:ffff>Thanks to this <clr:0000>extreme weather<clr:ffff>, almost
no one ever rides through here. We get
very few visitors.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I'm afraid we don't have any lodgings for
you, but if you're looking for a place to
rest your head...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I recommend <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>. Just head
out of here, turn <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>, and keep going
and going until you find it.
It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>As for me, I've got a mountain of junk to
clear out of here, so I should get back to
it. <sp:5:0:0>Otherwise, I'll never be able to leave...
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Ugh, how will I ever to <clr:0000>get rid of<clr:ffff> all this stuff?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Something else?<sp:5:1:0> If you want to stay the
night somewhere, I recommend you try
your luck at <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just step outside and keep going <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>.
You're sure to find it in due time.

It's a bit of a hike, but if you can find
some <clr:0000>transportation<clr:ffff> at the desert's
entrance, you can get there in a flash.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:LaughS_01>As for my tidying, well... I found some
stuff that brought back memories, and my
progress ground to a nostalgic halt.
I mean, this stable's like an old friend of
mine. If I clean it up, I want to clean it up
right. Give it the proper respect, y'know?
